title: Game freezes at CHAMP select
body:
Has anyone found a fix for this issue? I found a huge thread about this problem without a single riot reply.

Anyways I am entering game and it reaches champ select and all I see up top is a 0.. and no champions at all.
I can still interact with the client besides actually being able to lock in picks and banning.. or seeing anyones IGN.. this is frustrating and it's giving me a time penalty.. Any fix for this rito?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Yup, there's a fix for this. These issues occur if your connection to the matchmaking servers is *unstable or poor*. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers some common network configurations that can resolve these issues, so I recommend working through that guide in its entirety.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
